survey_name: Subscription Box Service Customer Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers of our subscription box service to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your subscription box?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency and easy analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your subscription box?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a subscription box service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture priorities without overwhelming respondents.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a subscription box service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our subscription box service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard NPS-style question; ensure it uses a consistent scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our subscription box service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our subscription box service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback; ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our subscription box service?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the products included in your subscription box?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge product utility.

script.question_text: How often do you use the products included in your subscription box?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a premium tier with higher-value products at a higher price point?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to assess interest in upselling.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in a premium tier with higher-value products at a higher price point?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery and packaging of your subscription box?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale for consistency with other satisfaction questions.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery and packaging of your subscription box?

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered any issues with your subscription box? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to identify recurring problems; optional follow-up for issue resolution.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered any issues with your subscription box? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: What type of products would you like to see more of in future boxes?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather ideas for product expansion.

script.question_text: What type of products would you like to see more of in future boxes?
